Offers.OfferTitle: World Elite Privileges: Quintessentially Wine
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Quintessentially Wine
Offers.OfferDetail:
As a World EliteTM cardholder, you are entitled to complimentary Quintessentially Wine membership - worth £250 - including the following superb benefits:

  • Sole access to rare and exclusive wines sourced by Matthew Jukes, one of the UK's leading wine experts
  • Wine advice, whether at home or at restaurants
  • Invitations to exclusive fine wine dinners and tasting events
  • Access to our fine wine list and fine wine advice service
  • Cellar evaluations and cellar building services
  • Guaranteed emergency wine solution, delivered within 24 hours
  • Access to exclusive wine trips and visits to historic wineries
  • Timed delivery slots available to any address in Central London
  • Deliveries outside Central London available on a next-day service

    • MasterCard Quintessentially Wine Service.

    In addition, World Elite cardholders are offered the exclusive MasterCard Quintessentially Wine Service including:

    • 5% discount on select wines when paying with your World Elite MasterCard
    • Special tasting events held twice a year in addition to wine dinners and events
    • Range of special mixed cases, featuring Matthew Juke's top selections
    • Range of MasterCard exclusive offers

    To take advantage of these superb benefits for UK World Elite cardholders, join MasterCard Quintessentially Wine Service - today!
Offers.TermsAndConditions:

Offers.Offer: Hundreds of great offers on London restaurants
Offers.OfferTitle: Hundreds of great offers on London Restaurants
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Instant confirmation and offers at over 1500 London restaurants
Offers.OfferDetail:
As one of the most vibrant cities in the world, London is full of fabulous dining opportunities. Whether you'd like to sample an authentic Indian curry or visit a delicious Argentinean steakhouse, the city boasts a variety of top-quality options, on any day of the week. However, it's tricky to find and book the best restaurants, which is where we've tried to help.

As a MasterCard cardholder, you can check availability and complete bookings at over 1,500 London restaurants through our Priceless London booking engine. You can complete your search by neighbourhood, preferred cuisine, or availability, and look out for restaurants with special offers - and it's all instant with live information. You can book the place and time you'd like from the comfort of your laptop, anywhere in the world. Your booking will be confirmed by SMS and email.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: See partner site for terms and conditions.

Offers.OfferTitle: Sake and Sushi MasterClass at Inamo St James Restaurant
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Learn new techniques and dine with the award winning Inamo St James
Offers.OfferDetail:
MasterCard Priceless London Exclusive Experience

Inamo St James is hosting a series of exclusive sushi & sake master classes for Priceless London. Guests will have the opportunity to don their aprons and learn how to prepare tasty nigiri & maki, alongside sampling hot and cold sakes. Experts will be on hand to explain the history, culture, and how to hold your sushi knife properly!

Format of the masterclass:

- 1.5 hour sessions

- Classes start at 18:30

- Maximum of 24 guests

- Split into 2 groups of 12, half do sushi first, half sake, then swap.

- 3 pieces of salmon maki per guest.

- 3 pieces of nigiri per guest.

- sushi served to all guests at end of session at bar to share.

- 2 sakes to taste (one hot, one cold).

- wasabi pea passing competition (incorporated into sake tasting) with winner getting flask of sake to share if staying for dinner.

- 15% off total bill if guests stay on to dine in the restaurant

About Inamo

Inamo St James couples high-quality food with a state-of-the-art concept .The upmarket Oriental fusion restaurant boasts the world's first interactive ordering system, where the menu is beamed straight onto the table surface and orders are placed at the touch of a virtual button.

On Lower Regent Street, metres from Piccadilly Circus, inamo st james is moments from many of Central London's theatres and shops. The interior, however, is an oasis of calm. A living vertical garden with waterfall features, a bamboo forest, and sliding screens with onyx panels give a sense of sanctuary from the bustling city outside.

Inamo St James was shortlisted in 2 categories for the 2011 Restaurant & Bar Design Awards.

How to book

Bookings must be made in advance and are subject to availability. Book now.

Payment of £25 per guest will need to be taken in advance to secure the booking. A member of the Inamo St James team will call to take payment.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: N/A

Offers.OfferTitle: Fine English cuisine and meet & greet with Nigel Mendham
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Choose one of three menus for a Priceless experience at Thirty Six
Offers.OfferDetail:
Enjoy a wonderful dining experience at Thirty Six thanks to your MasterCard. As a Priceless London guest you'll also receive a guaranteed reservation in the most popular section of the restaurant, along with an exclusive meet and greet with Michelin-star Chef Nigel Mendham.

This new restaurant at Dukes London Hotel, offers refined British cuisine. By using time-honored techniques and the very best British ingredients, Thirty Six creates mouth-watering meals in a relaxed setting. Each modern and traditional dish fits in perfectly with its quintessentially English values.

When you arrive, you'll choose from one of three set menus.

  • Lunch menu: £20 for 2 courses, £28 for 3 courses, with a glass of Champagne (available Mon - Sat)
  • Dinner menu £48 for 3 courses with a glass of champagne (available Mon - Sat). This experience starts at the Perrier Jouet Champagne lounge where you can enjoy a glass of champagne.
  • Sunday Lunch £27 for 3 courses with a glass of Buck's Fizz (available Sundays only). You'll choose from roast beef, Hake, free range chicken and a tempting selection of starters and desserts.

It's a fantastic chance to make the most of a relaxing and enjoyable dining experience with your MasterCard. Pre-booking is essential - book now to secure your reservation.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: N/A

Offers.OfferTitle: Visit Porters English Restaurant and receive a gift
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Diners will receive a complimentary signed 'Porters Seasonal Celebrations Cook Book' by the 7th Earl of Bradford when dining a la carte
Offers.OfferDetail:
Dine from the a la carte menu at Porters English Restaurant and receive a complimentary signed Cook Book per table, courtesy of MasterCard. 'Porters Seasonal Celebrations Cook Book' will be signed by the owner of Porters - The 7th Earl of Bradford. This entertaining and informative book includes a variety of traditional, classic and modern recipes.

Porters English Restaurant is well known for serving traditional English food at its finest. For many years, it has achieved the perfect balance of mouth-watering dishes, outstanding value and friendly service - all in the heart of Theatreland, London. It was opened in 1979 by The 7th Earl of Bradford and has continued to grow in popularity ever since.

Amongst some of the most acclaimed items on the menu is a selection of nine world-famous pies, including Steak, Guinness and Mushroom, Lamb and Apricot or Gamekeepers Pie. Grills at Porters are cooked over hot coals for full flavour retention, and include Aberdeen Angus Sirloin and Fillet. It's the perfect chance to enjoy delicious English food with your MasterCard in the heart of the capital.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: N/A

Offers.OfferTitle: Afternoon Tea at the Milestone before Kensington Palace
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Enjoy a sumptious afternoon tea with complimentary champagne, followed by a visit to the former residence of Princess Diana
Offers.OfferDetail:
Kensington Palace Tour and Afternoon Tea

In celebration of the Queen's Diamond Jubilee, we're giving MasterCard cardholders a very special opportunity in an exclusive royal package. You'll get to enjoy afternoon tea with complimentary champagne at The Milestone Hotel, opposite Kensington Gardens. After that, you'll cross the road to visit the newly-transformed Kensington Palace - once home to Princess Diana. It's only recently reopened following a two-year, £12 million refurbishment.

You'll start at The Milestone which was named Top Small City Hotel in Europe by Travel + Leisure Magazine, in their World's Best Hotels 2011. This traditional afternoon tea will be characterised by incredible attention to detail and etiquette, with silver teapots and delicate china.

You'll then move on to the special Kensington Palace Tour, where you'll discover stories from Queen Victoria's life, told in her own words in the new Victoria Revealed exhibition. You'll master the games of royal court in the magnificent King's State Apartments and get a glimpse of a modern Princess in a small but iconic exhibition of some of Diana's dresses.

This fantastic MasterCard offer is available for the 1pm Afternoon Tea sitting from 1st of September to 31st October 2012. Please note that last admission to the Palace is 5pm. You will receive your tickets to the Palace following your Afternoon Tea. Priced at £46.00 per person.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: N/A

Offers.OfferTitle: Afternoon Tea experience with friends at The Rubens
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Have exclusive use of the Leopard Room for parties up to 10 people
Offers.OfferDetail:
Get exclusive use of The Leopard Bar for your Afternoon Tea party with friends, courtesy of Priceless London. The Rubens Afternoon Tea - Minimum of 6 and maximum of 10 people - comprises four courses including a glass of Dom Perignon Champagne for £75 per person incl. VAT. You'll have sole use of the bar area to enjoy the delicate delights, while receiving the utmost care and attention from the restaurant team.

Overlooking the Royal Mews, The Leopard Champagne Bar is the newest private bar for discerning guests at The Rubens. Its intimate atmosphere designed in elegant safari-chic, echoes the famous Leopard Room Bar at the sibling Hotel d'Angleterre in Geneva. This haven of style is perfect for celebrations or conversations in a warm, inviting and exclusive environment. It lies at the heart of London's biggest tourist attractions in an unbeatable location. It's the closest hotel to Buckingham Palace, and within easy walking distance of Victoria Station and some of London's best shops and restaurants.

This fantastic MasterCard experience is available from 1st Sept to 31st Oct 2012 and bookings are subject to availability. Book now to secure an afternoon to remember.

Offers.OfferTitle: Complimentary Pim Pom cocktail with The Montague
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Savour the Best of British afternoon tea in the Secret Garden at The Montague
Offers.OfferDetail:
To celebrate the numerous exciting events occurring in the capital this summer, you can enjoy a Best of British afternoon tea menu with MasterCard. It takes place at The Montague Hotel and features a fun selection of pastries such as a Wimbledon pistachio cupcake and Victoria sponge in celebration of the Diamond Jubilee. There's also a nod to Ascot with a chocolate and praline top hat, as well as a range of delicious savoury finger sandwiches and Kentish strawberries and cream.

When you book your table in the Secret Garden, you'll also receive a complimentary Pim Pom cocktail thanks to Priceless London. It's tucked away in a quiet oasis in the midst of bustling London, making it the perfect place to spend the balmy English summer evenings. Charming lanterns will lure you through to an English garden decorated with birch, entwined and rambling Leanna vine and summer flowers such as roses and hanging wisteria. It's your chance to make the most of this MasterCard offer in a beautifully relaxing garden space.

Book now to secure your Priceless experience.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: N/A

Offers.OfferTitle: Priceless London afternoon tea at The Chesterfield Hotel
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Receive a complimentary glass of champagne with your afternoon tea booking
Offers.OfferDetail:
As a MasterCard cardholder, you can enjoy a complimentary glass of champagne at Butler's at The Chesterfield Hotel. Just make an afternoon tea booking online between the 1st Sept and the 31st October 2012 to redeem this fantastic offer.

The Chesterfield Hotel is secreted away, just off Berkeley Square in the select district of Mayfair. Butler's take tremendous pleasure in serving home-made cakes and pastries prepared by Tom, the chef pâtissier. Choose from traditional afternoon tea, add a dash of Champagne, or indulge in the unique Chocolate Afternoon Tea.

Book here to secure this Priceless experience.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: N/A

Offers.OfferTitle: Enjoy the 'Best of British' with Wiltons
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Dine from an exclusive Tasting Menu, receive a complimentary glass of champagne and secure one of the best seats in the house
Offers.OfferDetail:
Dine at Wiltons with MasterCard Priceless London and select from an exclusive tasting menu that celebrates the finest British cuisine. You'll also be offered a complimentary glass of champagne on arrival and guaranteed seating in one of Wiltons' booths - a coveted area in the restaurant which is rarely pre-booked.

Since Wiltons was established in 1742, it has consistently enjoyed a reputation as the epitome of fine English dining in London. The atmosphere is perfectly matched with the immaculately prepared wild fish, shellfish and meat dishes sourced from the finest farms. These are further complimented with an exclusive wine list to choose from. Over the years, it's received a number of special awards:

  • British Oyster Opening Champions: 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007
  • Voted Best British Restaurant alongside The Goring by Zagat 2011

    • It's a fantastic place to enjoy a truly Priceless dining experience.

    • Five courses 80.00 with wine 155.00
    • Six courses 90.00 with wine 175.00

    Book now to secure your place.

Offers.OfferTitle: Priceless London Whisky Dinner at Albannach
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Dine from a British three-course seasonal menu followed by an exclusive Whiskey flight presented by the bar manager
Offers.OfferDetail:
As a MasterCard cardholder, you can take advantage of a wonderful Priceless London Whisky Dinner Experience. For just £35 per person, you'll receive a delicious 3 course set menu, featuring scallops with bacon, baby leeks and lemon thyme. You'll enjoy beef Wellington, green beans and whisky sauce, as well as a pear and butterscotch "millefeuille". After dinner you and your guests will be presented with an exclusive whisky flight, offered by one of the experienced bar managers.

The exclusive experience is available from Tuesday to Saturday at any time, subject to availability. Situated in Trafalgar Square, in the heart of the capital, Albannach incorporates a dramatic ground floor restaurant and bar with unrivalled views of the square, an intimate mezzanine restaurant, a stunning private dining room, and a striking vaulted cocktail bar and live music club - the A-Lounge.

The selection of food focuses on quality ingredients sourced from the best suppliers throughout the United Kingdom. While you'll find contemporary British cuisine throughout the menu, there are also some Scottish classics on offer all year round - including haggis with neeps & tatties, and cranachan. It's a wonderful Priceless London experience which you can book now by emailing Priceless London at pricelesslondon@bookatable.com

Offers.Offer: Seven Park Place by William Drabble
Offers.OfferTitle: Michelin Dining at Seven Park Place by William Drabble
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Enjoy a six-course degustation menu and receive a free glass of champagne for just £69 pp
Offers.OfferDetail:
Enjoy an exclusive Priceless London dining experience at William Drabble's award-winning restaurant. You'll receive a complimentary glass of Champagne when ordering the degustation menu - six delicious courses showcasing the culinary skills that won him a Michelin star.

Seven Park Place by William Drabble was launched in September 2009 and was awarded one Michelin star only a year after opening. William's menus are modern French, made using mainly British ingredients and inspired by the seasons. Seven Park Place is an elegant and intimate space with only 26 covers; the beautiful fabrics and bright, jewel-inspired colours provide a stunning backdrop for the perfect dining experience.

The degustation menu is priced at £69 per person and is valid for lunch and dinner - although it is closed on Sunday and Monday. For celebrations of six or more people, you can enjoy this offer in the exclusive surroundings of the hotel's private dining rooms at no extra charge and William Drabble will meet you at the end of your meal to answer all of your questions, making it a truly Priceless experience.

Offers.OfferTitle: Panoramic views and champagne at the Blueprint Café
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Enjoy unique views across London and a complimentary glass of champagne when dining at Blueprint Café
Offers.OfferDetail:
As a MasterCard cardholder you can dine at Blueprint Café for just £23 per person. You'll enjoy a complimentary glass of champagne with your delicious 3-course lunch or dinner, while taking in the spectacular elevated views of Tower Bridge sweeping through to Canary Wharf.

Situated on the first floor of the Design Museum, it's a great opportunity to sample Head Chef, Mark Jarvis' style and flavour. Mark's background includes time spent at Michelin-starred The Lords of the Manor under Toby Gill, The Thatch in Thame and the two Michelin star Le Manoir near Oxford. Mark's menus for the Blueprint Café showcase simple yet innovative dishes that draw on his classical training and demonstrate his belief in the quality of the ingredients above all else.

It's a fantastic chance to enjoy a unique Priceless London experience. Just book now to secure your table.
Offers.TermsAndConditions:
Offer available Mon-Fri 12pm-2pm or 6pm-7.30pm.

Guests are to order from the set menu of the day.

Offer must be stated at time of booking.

Offers.OfferTitle: Experience 'The Chef's Office at Launceston Place' first
Offers.OfferSubtitle: A new exciting venue from D&D London - 'The Chef's Office at Launceston Place' offers a unique interactive dining experience in the heart of London.
Offers.OfferDetail:
The Chef's Office at Launceston Place: a brand new dining concept

Enjoy a magnificent insight into one of London's most exciting new kitchens at The Chef's Office at Launceston Place. You'll be able to see the chefs via a plasma TV screen, hear them and talk to them with each course served. You'll also experience a tour of a working kitchen and occasionally even cook one of your own courses.

The Head Chef, Tim Allen, has designed an 8-course tasting menu from £ 65; while an 8-course tasting menu with wine pairing costs £118. It's a wonderful chance to get exclusive access to the adrenaline of the kitchen throughout service. Plus, as well as having direct contact with Tim, you'll also benefit from our experienced Sommelier team who will be on hand to recommend wines that compliment each course.

The Chef's Office is situated directly adjacent to the kitchen at Launceston Place and can accommodate a minimum of 6 guests and a maximum of 12 guests. This truly unique dining experience is available exclusively to MasterCard cardholders. Book now by emailing pricelesslondon@bookatable.com including contact details and the date you would like to dine.

Availability:

Monday to Sunday 6pm-10:30pm

Tuesday to Sunday 12:00pm-2:30pm

Offers.OfferTitle: Exclusive Masterclass at Paternoster Chop House
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Completely bespoke masterclass where you can learn new skills with Head Chef, Bruce Wilson
Offers.OfferDetail:
Visit Paternoster Chop House and experience a Kitchen Masterclass with Priceless London. Join Head Chef Bruce Wilson from 3pm in the kitchen where you'll be shown first-hand how to either make your own British 'Fruit of the Sea' platter, how to prepare game and/or how to bake the perfect apple pie! Having learnt the skills to make these traditional British Classics you will then be invited to sit for an early supper and dine on the 'fruit of your labour' with our head sommelier on hand to help you pair wines with your dishes.

Set against the awesome backdrop of St Paul's Cathedral, Paternoster Chop House is a restaurant that offers diners traditional and robust British dishes in relaxed, modern surroundings. It's the ideal setting to enjoy an à la carte lunch or dinner from our extensive British menu.

All dishes are based on two guests dining as they are large enough to share and are priced at £20 for the Fruits of the Sea, £35 for the game and £14 for the apple pie. The prices are inclusive of the experience, the dish you prepare and a cocktail when you sit down to dine - usually charged at £200 for a party of 6 people.

This exclusive MasterCard offer is available Monday to Friday from 3pm and Sunday from 10am and is subject to availability. To book, please email the reservation team at pricelesslondon@bookatable.com with your chosen date and we will be in touch to secure this fantastic experience for you.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: N/A

Offers.OfferTitle: Wine matching - Captain's Table, Butler's Wharf Chop House
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Wines hand-picked by the Sommelier to accompany your meal
Offers.OfferDetail:
Butler's Wharf Chop House

Reserve the Captain's table at Butler's Wharf Chop House and receive a bespoke 5-course food and wine menu, courtesy of Priceless London. It's your opportunity to make the most of your MasterCard by sampling the best of British produce, and enjoying sommelier-chosen wine pairings.

The restaurant is located on London's Shad Thames and offers incredible views of the river whilst providing outstanding British fare. The Captain's Table is a semi private area which seats up to 15 people so you can enjoy an unrivalled private dining experience amidst the buzz of a full restaurant. In good weather, the terrace doors can be opened so you and your guests can enjoy breathtaking views from any seat. It's a fantastic offering for groups over 10 and is a great way to celebrate a special occasion.

You can also make the most of a tailor-made package, put together by a dedicated Events Co-ordinator and Chef. Prices start at £55.00 for 5 courses, excluding matching wine. To book, just email pricelesslondon@bookatable.com with reservation details and the team will be in touch to confirm your booking.

Subject to availability and available 1st September - 31st October.

Offers.OfferTitle: Exclusive experiences at new D&D London venue openings
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Be the first to see some of the hottest new venues in London with Priceless London
Offers.OfferDetail:
Angler at South Place Hotel, New Street Grill and Fishmarket - Three New Openings from D&D London

This September sees the opening of three fabulous new city hotspots from D&D London. To celebrate these fantastic openings we'd like to offer all MasterCard holders priority booking for a limited time only. From 17th September to 31st October you can be some of the first diners to experience what these restaurants have to offer. Plus, you'll also receive a complimentary glass of champagne.

South Place Hotel, D&D London's first ever hotel, will be an 80-bedroom boutique hotel situated in the heart of the city near Liverpool Street station. Home to two dining options: 3 South Place, and the Angler restaurant located on the rooftop which offers city-wide views of London. Nearby, The Old Bengal Warehouse development will house two new restaurants - New Street Grill, and Fishmarket. In true city style, the former will serve up meaty options with a focus on British produce, while the latter will offer more elegant dining, focusing on sustainable fish dishes.

To book one of these fantastic experiences, please email pricelesslondon@bookatable.com with details of your party and our team will be in touch to secure this for you.

Offers.OfferTitle: Exclusive cocktail master class at the Tramshed
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Learn top tips from the HIX Group Bars Manager to get the ultimate home bar
Offers.OfferDetail:
Enjoy an exclusive cocktail master class at Mark's Library Kitchen in the Tramshed for just £50 per person. You'll be welcomed by the bar's manager, Lee Potter Cavanagh, with a glass of punch in an area not normally open to the general public. You'll then be guided through the basics of maintaining a functioning home bar, before looking closely at some simple recipes that you should always have on hand. After learning how to perfect simple classics like martini, you'll finish by seeing how to add some intricate delicacies that'll give your cocktails an extra touch of class.

Lee Potter Cavanagh, who will guide you through each step of your master class, discovered a passion for working at bars when at Hugo's Bar Pizza in 2005. He is now the Group Bars Manager for the HIX Food Etc group. He's worked at and managed some of Australia's most awarded cocktail bars, including The Victoria Room, Lotus, Hemmesphere and The Rum Diaries. Lee has competed and placed in numerous high profile competitions and his passion for bartending has led him to present at Tales of the Cocktail in New Orleans and host the Australia-wide yearly bartender competition. He's now very excited about the challenge of leading the bar teams at one of the premier groups of bars and restaurants in the UK.

The master classes take place on Tuesday 18th of September and Tuesday 16th of October at 6.30pm - 8.30pm, with a maximum number of six people per class. To book now, please email pricelesslondon@bookatable.com.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: N/A

Offers.OfferTitle: Complimentary Martini when dining à la carte at 1901
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Enjoy sumptuous surroundings whilst sampling 1901's signature cocktail
Offers.OfferDetail:
Visit 1901 restaurant and enjoy a complimentary signature cocktail (Jack's Martini) when dining from the à la carte menu. This offer, which is available exclusively to MasterCard cardholders, also comes with the chance to undertake a mini masterclass making the cocktail with our head bar tender - at no extra cost.The experience is subject to availability as displayed in the booking window and is limited to parties of up to five people. Click here to check availability and secure your booking.

1901 restaurant at Andaz Liverpool Street hotel introduces an entirely fresh and dynamic approach to fine dining. The menu is built around a respect for the best and most diverse home-grown produce that Britain has to offer.

Set in what was once the Great Eastern Hotel's original ballroom, this magnificent Grade-two listed room provides a stunning setting. On arrival, guests can enjoy pre-dinner cocktails and champagne at the centrepiece floating bar, underneath one of London's original stained glass domes. It's a wonderful chance to enjoy one of the finest dining experiences in the capital with Priceless London.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: N/A

Offers.OfferTitle: Intimate fine dining at The Montague
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Enjoy an exclusive 'Best of British' Chef's Table experience with your MasterCard
Offers.OfferDetail:
Dine at the Chef's table at The Churchill as part of a VIP MasterCard experience. The evening is a celebration of the 'Best of British' ingredients in London's West End, combining seasonal dining with traditional British wines, beers and ciders.

The Montague at the Churchill is one of the finest 5-star hotels in London. Its positioning in the Marylebone area, adjacent to Park Lane, ensures that it's one of the best-situated luxury hotels in the city from which to explore Hyde Park, Marble Arch and Buckingham Palace - some of the capital's most celebrated landmarks. The Chef's Table overlooks the open plan kitchen at The Montagu restaurant, giving you a front-row seat to see the fast-paced life of a chef at a five-star hotel. With personal interaction, you'll get a perfect view of the masterful chefs as they craft each artful dish.

Chef de Cuisine Carlos Machado and his team have created a spectacular menu which has received numerous accolades. Highlights include the award-winning Nyetimber Classic Cuvée served with London Cured Smoked Salmon as well as handpicked Cornish Scallops with Chapel Down's wonderfully aromatic, light and crisp Pinot Blanc 2009. The Best of British Chef's Table is available from 1 September to 30 October 2012 for both lunch and dinner. The Chef's Table seats six to nine people and is available at lunch or dinner throughout the week at £75.00 per person for five-courses, including all drinks. An optional 12.5% service charge will be added to the bill.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: Bookatable Terms and Conditions apply.

Offers.OfferTitle: Roll up! Roll up! Cantina at Priceless London Wonderground
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Ring side seats & VIP Bar access to the greatest cabaret show everyone is talking about!
Offers.OfferDetail:
MasterCard has teamed up with Underbelly and Southbank Centre to bring you the Priceless London Wonderground - a festival of cabaret, music, sideshow and fantastic circus entertainment. Built around a magnificent 1920s Spiegeltent, it brings a taste of early 20th Century Coney Island to London. International circus hit Cantina is headlining all summer, so come on down to the South Bank for an evening of beautiful, exhilarating and truly breathtaking entertainment.

Every Thursday Priceless London is delighted to offer cardholders the chance to buy ring side seats to Cantina with access to the VIP Bar, a complimentary drink before and after the show for just £45, exclusively for MasterCard cardholders.

Book now to secure your Priceless London experience.
Offers.TermsAndConditions:
1. Offer only valid if purchased using your MasterCard.

2. Offer is only available through the Priceless London website: www.pricelesslondon.co.uk

3. The booking period for tickets is 27/05/2012 - 27/09/2012 or until all the tickets are gone, whichever comes first.

4. Tickets are £45 and include: early entrance into the venue, complimentary welcome and after show drink, 1 x ringside seat ticket, access to the VIP Bar.

5. Tickets will be valid for Thursdays between 07/07/2012 - 27/09/2012 excluding 26/07/2012.

6. Maximum 2 tickets can be purchased with this offer.

7. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other discount offer or promotion.

Offers.OfferDetail:
Enjoy a 10% discount at Burlington Arcade, thanks to a priceless VIP card available to all MasterCard cardholders. From Heming Jewellers to Harrys of London, you'll be able to get special offers at a number of prestigious stores. The Arcade has always been considered a true luxury landmark in London ever since it was first unveiled to great acclaim in 1819. As the longest, most beautiful covered shopping street in Britain, it has always led the way in retail trends and remains a pioneer to this day. It's a truly timeless destination in the heart of Mayfair - an iconic runway uniting Piccadilly and Bond Street.

Now, you'll be able to look around the Arcade's timeless collectables or more contemporary items safe in the knowledge that you're getting outstanding value. Whether you're searching for rare antique diamonds or soft cashmere jumpers, you'll find a huge variety of tempting treasures on offer - with each one more accessible than ever before.

Quite simply, the Burlington Arcade is the epitome of luxury, where you'll enjoy impeccable service and unparalleled specialist knowledge. It's your chance to uncover rare examples of some of the world's finest accessories. With your special VIP discount card, there's is no finer place to shop.

Speedo, the world's leading swimwear brand, is passionate about life in and around the water, creating revolutionary new technologies and designs all the time. Now, thanks to your MasterCard, you can be a part of the Speedo story. Just go along to the store, spend £100 and take home a wonderful underwater camera featuring innovative technology including:; Underwater 5 mega pixel camera; Video function; Durable, beach-proof and easy to use; Floats if dropped in the water; Image sensor and zoom function; LCD Display; Self-Timer; Up to 3 metres of water resistance; Auto Exposure  Claim your camera at Speedo at 41-43 Neal Street, Seven Dials, Covent Garden WC2H 9PJ. To redeem this offer, either click to download the voucher and present in-store, or simply quote "e;Priceless London"e; when paying with your MasterCard.

Offers.OfferTitle: Free fast track upgrade
Offers.OfferSubtitle: The EDF Energy London Eye with MasterCard
Offers.OfferDetail:
At 135 metres, the EDF Energy London Eye is the world's tallest cantilevered observation wheel, providing unique panoramic views of up to 40 km on a clear day. The gradual rotation in one of the 32 high-tech glass capsules takes approximately 30 minutes, offering breathtaking views of London and its famous landmarks, such as Big Ben, Buckingham Palace, Trafalgar Square, St Paul's Cathedral, 30 St Mary Axe ('The Gherkin'), Canary Wharf and more. With those inspiring perspectives on offer, The EDF Energy London Eye will lift you up like nothing else.

The EDF Energy London Eye is pleased to offer MasterCard Cardholders a Free Fast Track Upgrade on full price adult EDF Energy London Eye tickets every day of the week*

To obtain your MasterCard offer please call:

  • Within the UK: 0871 2829240
  • Outside the UK: +44 871 2829240
Offers.TermsAndConditions:
The offer is valid for all adults (aged 18 years and upwards).

A free Fast Track upgrade will be given on the purchase of a full priced adult standard EDF Energy London Eye when using your MasterCard.

This offer is not valid between 27th July - 19th August 2012, 29th August - 9th September, 25th December and 31st December 2012.

The validity of the vouchers is for a 3 month period from date of purchase.

To obtain your MasterCard offer please call:

  • Within the UK: 0871 2829240 (calls cost 10p per minute plus network extras)
  • Outside the UK: +44 871 2829240 (calls will be charged at standard international rates)

Offers.OfferTitle: Treat yourself and a friend at the Harrods Spa
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Enjoy a bespoke experience at the Harrods Urban Retreat Spa, exclusively for cardholders.
Offers.OfferDetail:
This special package is tailored exclusively for MasterCard cardholders. It's the perfect chance for you and a friend to spoil yourselves with a day of ultimate relaxation.

The Harrods Urban Retreat Spa is widely acknowledged as the ultimate beauty destination in London. It combines the talent of leading therapists with the finest brands in the world, ensuring you'll have an unforgettable and luxurious experience. You'll have the opportunity to pamper yourself with two treatments chosen from the Spa Menu. From manicures to essential grooming services, it's the chance to indulge in the perfect day out.

After your treatments you'll both receive a goody bag before enjoying lunch or afternoon tea at the East Dulwich Deli, complete with a glass of complimentary champagne. The deli is all about great tasting, nourishing food, made from locally sourced ingredients. It offers a range of optimum health and super food salads, as well as juices endorsed by well-known nutritionist, Pam Stepney.

IN ASSOCIATION WITH HARRODS REWARDS

5. The Offer: Purchase a Harrods Treat Yourself Experience from Harrods for £200. Offers.OfferTitle: The ultimate family day out with Harrods
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Enjoy a tour of Harrods and brunch at The Georgian restaurant, before boarding their famous bus to see the best of London
Offers.OfferDetail:
Enjoy an exclusive VIP experience for four people at Harrods with MasterCard. This perfect family day out gives you the opportunity to see one of the world's most prestigious department stores before the doors open. During your early morning tour, you'll watch it come to life while learning some fascinating facts about how the store is run - did you know 300 of the outside light bulbs are changed every day? As well as taking in some of the newer departments like the Pet Spa, and Toy Kingdom, you'll also get to appreciate the more established sections that make up its proud history.

After the tour, you'll receive brunch at the famous Georgian restaurant, sampling some of the fantastic food on offer. It'll set you up for the day ahead, which will see you join a Harrods Vintage Bus Tour with a Thames River Cruise. This exclusive trip will take you around London's most renowned landmarks, including Big Ben, The Houses of Parliament, The Royal Albert Hall, The London Eye and many more.

You'll be taken through the entire experience with a professional guide, while also having the opportunity to stop for photos at key moments. From iconic ceremonies such as the changing of the guard, to Westminster Abbey where Prince William married Kate Middleton, you'll be able to fully immerse yourself in a Priceless London experience. The tour includes a leisurely trip up the River Thames, where you'll enjoy fantastic views of Cleopatra's Needle, Shakespeare's Globe and London Bridge.

This package includes a goody bag for each guest and costs £150 for group of four. Additional passes can be purchased for just £50 for adults or, £25 for children. It's your exclusive chance to experience the best of London with MasterCard, starting at its most famous store.

Offers.OfferTitle: V&A Cafe Offer
Offers.OfferSubtitle: 10% off at the V&A Café with your MasterCard every Friday evening
Offers.OfferDetail:
The V&A Café offers hot dishes, salads, sandwiches, pastries and cakes, as well as hot and cold drinks, wine and beer. All food is prepared and cooked on the premises using fresh food, bought daily.

The Café is located in the V&A's original refreshment rooms, the Morris, Gamble and Poynter Rooms. These three rooms formed the first museum restaurant in the world and were intended as a showpiece of modern design, craftsmanship and manufacturing.

The V&A Cafe is pleased to offer MasterCard cardholders 10% discount on purchases of food and soft drinks every Friday evening (18.30-21.30).

Download and print this voucher and use your MasterCard to redeem your discount.*

*Terms and conditions apply

Images: © Victoria and Albert Museum, London

2. Voucher entitles bearer to a 10% discount on one transaction

3. Any items purchased outside of these times may not be returned or refunded.

4. Must present voucher to redeem discount.

5. Offer only valid when using a MasterCard.

6. Not to be used in conjunction with any other offer.

7. This offer does not include purchases of alcoholic beverage

Offers.OfferTitle: V&A Exhibition Offer
Offers.OfferSubtitle: 2 for 1 entry to any exhibition at the V&A every Friday night with your MasterCard
Offers.OfferDetail:
The V&A is the world's greatest museum of art and design. The V&A's outstanding collections represent over three thousand years of creativity from across Europe, Asia and the Middle East. The Museum offers internationally acclaimed temporary exhibitions, complementing the Museum's permanent collection, taking a look in depth at a broad range of subjects from design and fashion to photography and architecture.

The V&A is pleased to offer MasterCard cardholders a 2 for 1 offer on full price tickets for all fee-charging V&A exhibitions every Friday evening (18.30 - 20.45)

Download and print this voucher and use your MasterCard to redeem your discount.*

Current and forthcoming exhibitions include:

*Queen Elizabeth II by Cecil Beaton: A Diamond Jubilee Celebration (8 February - 22 April 2012) *British Design 1948-2012: Innovation in the Modern Age (31 March - 12 August 2012) *Ballgowns: 60 Years of British Glamour (17 May 2012 - 6 January 2013) *Heatherwick Studio (31 May - 30 September 2012) *Hollywood Costume (20 October 2012 - 27 January 2013)

Images: © Victoria and Albert Museum, London

Offers.OfferTitle: 2 for 1 entry at Madame Tussauds London
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Pay for one entry with your MasterCard and get another one free
Offers.OfferDetail:
Walk down the red carpet and strike a pose with Kate Winslet, before stepping into our interactive sports zone alongside David Beckham. Start your royal experience with a once-in-a-lifetime audience with Her Majesty The Queen, then brave the serial killers in SCREAM! Relax in our taxis and relive London's rich history before entering the spectacular and exclusive Marvel Super Heroes 4D movie experience!

Since it first opened its doors over 250 years ago Madame Tussauds London has featured a host of famous faces and now thanks to Priceless London you can enjoy 2 for 1 entry, simply pay for one entry on your MasterCard and receive another entry absolutely free. Just print out the voucher from this page and present it when you pay with your MasterCard.

  • SEA LIFE London Aquarium
  • the London Dungeon

Offers.OfferTitle: 2 for 1 entry at the London Dungeon
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Pay for one entry with your MasterCard and get another one free
Offers.OfferDetail:
Delve into the capital's bloody history at the notorious London Dungeon. With fantastic actors, a dark history, thrilling rides and special effects, it's one of the most exciting experiences in the city. Buy one ticket with your MasterCard and receive another ticket free. Just print out the voucher from this page and present it when you pay with your MasterCard MasterCard. Are you brave enough to face 90 minutes of London's goriest past?

From serial killer Jack the Ripper, barber Sweeney Todd and regal Bloody Mary, you'll feel the icy shadow of London's terrifying history. Once you've experienced some of the gloomiest sections, including the black plague and the fearsome torture chambers, you'll be able to indulge on three electrifying rides; steel your nerves for a Victorian séance in London's most haunted house on Vengeance: the UK's first 5D laser ride, before facing your final moments on Extremis: drop ride to doom!

  • 14 shows on your 90 minute tour
  • Live actors and special effects
  • 3 exciting rides
  • 1,000 years of London's history

Offers.OfferTitle: Science Museum Shop offer
Offers.OfferSubtitle: 10% off at the Science Museum Shop with your MasterCard
Offers.OfferDetail:
The Science Museum is pleased to offer MasterCard cardholders a 10% discount on purchases at the Science Museum Shop at every Lates event. There is a full range of science-inspired souvenirs and gadgets for adults and children as well as the brand new range of ingenious products, designed by the Science Museum's inventor in residence: Mark Champkins. Choose from chemistry sets, stylish science themed home gadgets, robots, telescopes and more.

Every purchase helps support the Museum.
Offers.TermsAndConditions:

Offers.OfferTitle: World Elite Privileges: Accor
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Superb benefits at Sofitel, Pullman and MGallery hotels
Offers.OfferDetail:
World EliteTM cardholders are invited to join Accor's elite tier membership programme, A|Club - at A|Club Platinum level. Eligibility normally requires 60 nights stay per year at any of Accor's 2,000 participating hotels. What's more, this exceptional offer is complimentary for the entire lifetime of your World Elite membership. It's just one of the many superb benefits you'll receive as a World Elite cardholder.

As a member of A|Club Platinum, you are entitled to a range of superb benefits from Sofitel, Pullman and MGallery hotels, including:

  • Complimentary room upgrades*
  • Welcome drink and a gift
  • Guaranteed room availability (even when the chosen hotel is fully booked, if you book 3 days ahead)
  • Late check-out till 4pm, when you specify this upon arrival

You'll also earn points 100% faster across all participating Accor hotels, which can be redeemed against free A|Club hotel vouchers or airline miles with over 12 international airlines. These include British Airways, Air France KLM, Lufthansa Miles & More.

As a privileged World Elite cardholder, it's your exclusive chance to take advantage of the superb VIP benefits of Accor A|Club Platinum membership.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: *Subject to availability and A|Club usual Terms & Conditions.

Offers.OfferTitle: World Elite Privileges: Avis
Offers.OfferSubtitle: VIP upgrades and discounts with Avis
Offers.OfferDetail:
As a World EliteTM cardholder, you're invited to join Avis Preferred Club with free membership for the recurring membership period of 3 years*. It means you'll be able to make the most of fantastic benefits such as:

  • 1 class car upgrade, subject to availability
  • Up to 35% discount off standard rates
  • Up to 35% discount off leisure rates
  • Up to 35% discount off easy Europe/Africa rates

It's a chance for you, as a World Elite cardholder, to take advantage of our close relationship with Avis and receive a range of superb benefits.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: *Subject to availability and Avis Preferred Club usual Terms & Conditions.

Offers.OfferTitle: World Elite Privileges: GHA Discovery
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Enjoy an instant upgrade to Platinum level with upgrades, late check-out and more…
Offers.OfferDetail:
You can now become a member of GHA Discovery - the perfect place to book an adventure. You're eligible for membership thanks to your status as a World Elite cardholder, and it comes with a host of eye-catching benefits.

Cardholders are invited to join the GHA Discovery programme, the guest programme of Global Hotel Alliance. It means you'll also receive an instant upgrade to Platinum Level membership. It's an exclusive reward that usually requires members to spend at least 10 nights per year at any of the 270+ participating Global Hotel Alliance's hotels which cover 12 luxury brands in 48 countries worldwide.

GHA Discovery rewards travellers with amazing 'Local Experiences' designed by local experts. By gaining Platinum Level membership you'll also receive:

  • Room upgrades
  • Guaranteed room availability (48 hours prior to arrival)
  • Late check-out until 3pm
  • Complimentary Internet access
  • Daily newspapers and complimentary bottled water - and much more.

GHA Discovery members can also earn miles with travel partners, including British Airways, Air France/KLM Flying Blue, Miles & More and SAS EuroBonus. It's a unique chance to take advantage of our partnership with GHA Discovery. We hope you get the most out of your membership.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: Terms and Conditions apply. Full membership Terms and Conditions are available at: www.gha.com.

Offers.OfferTitle: World Elite Privileges: Hertz
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Free membership of the Hertz #1 Gold Club offering upgrades and much more
Offers.OfferDetail:
As a World EliteTM cardholder, you're invited to join Hertz #1 Club Gold, with FREE membership for the recurring period of four years*.

This exceptional offer includes:

  • 1 car class upgrade, subject to availability
  • Guaranteed 15% discount off best available rates worldwide, for online and offline bookings
  • Free one-way rentals (i.e. hire in one location and return to another)
  • £1/€1 off per day or £5/€5 off per week on Hertz
  • NeverLost®, the Hertz GPS satellite navigation solution, in participating countries where available.

It's a unique chance to take advantage of the outstanding range of benefits Hertz has to offer. As a World Elite cardholder, we're delighted to be able to give you the opportunity to take advantage of this deal.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: *Subject to availability and Hertz #1 Club Gold usual Terms & Conditions.

Offers.OfferTitle: World Elite Privileges: Hand Picked Hotels
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Invite you to join The Club, the loyalty programme at some of the UK's finest hotels
Offers.OfferDetail:
Hand Picked Hotels is delighted to be able to offer you some fantastic benefits, courtesy of your World EliteTM MasterCard. As a cardholder, you'll be able to take advantage of exclusive treatment from the award-winning Hand Picked Hotels. Each one is renowned for exquisite food, fine wines and excellent service in stylish, relaxing surroundings.

There are 17 hotels across the UK with locations including the New Forest, Jersey, Yorkshire and Edinburgh. As a World Elite cardholder you'll be eligible for the top tier Gold membership of the Hand Picked Hotels loyalty programme, The Club, after your first residential booking.

Gold membership includes the following superb benefits:

  • A welcome drink on arrival
  • A complimentary bedroom upgrade to the next bedroom type, on arrival and if available
  • A fruit bowl in bedroom on arrival
  • A newspaper of choice each morning
  • A 10% discount on any spa treatments taken during the stay
  • Gold loyalty club points, earned with the ratio of one to every £6 spent which can be redeemed against a range of exciting rewards
  • A welcome pack and Gold membership card being dispatched within one week of the first residential stay

To find out more about The Club, please visit the Club section on the website www.handpickedhotels.co.uk/loyalty-club or telephone the dedicated UK based Club membership and central reservations team on 0845 458 0903.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: Terms and Conditions apply. Full membership Terms and Conditions are available at: www.handpickedhotels.co.uk

Offers.OfferTitle: W London-Leicester Square
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Enjoy complimentary daily breakfast, plus a signature AWAY spa massage during  your stay
Offers.OfferDetail:
Stay in a premium Suite at W London-Leicester Square in the heart of the West End and enjoy complimentary daily breakfast, plus a signature AWAY spa massage during your stay. Rates start from £569+VAT per night in a Spa Suite.

Valid for stays through to end of December 2012.

Offers.OfferTitle: The Milestone Hotel
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Stay for two nights or more and receive a £50 voucher to spend at Harrods
Offers.OfferDetail:
The Milestone Hotel is an award winning five star family run boutique hotel overlooking Kensington Palace and Gardens in the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea. The Milestone consistently ranks among Europe's top hotels and is regularly voted by TripAdvisor® as the number one hotel in London. If you stay for two nights or more you'll receive a £50 voucher to spend at the world famous Harrods Department store, located nearby.

To help you get started on your shopping trip, staff will arrange for a private car to take you from the hotel to Harrods. After all of your shopping is done you can unwind whilst enjoying a delicious Afternoon Tea for two. On top of all this you will also be able to start each day of your stay at The Milestone Hotel with a traditional full English Breakfast.
Offers.TermsAndConditions:
Offer valid till 31 December 2012.

Offer is subject to availability. Blackout dates may apply.

See partner site for full terms and conditions.

Offers.OfferTitle: 10% off your VIP lounge pass with MasterCard
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Start your trip to or from London in style
Offers.OfferDetail:
Start your trip to or from London in style with 10% off a VIP lounge experience with MasterCard. You can select a lounge pass in all the major London airports, as well as over 150 registered airports worldwide, including 22 in the UK alone. It means whether you're about to embark on a long-haul flight to New York, or a much shorter trip such as a minibreak to Dublin, you can start every journey in the best possible way.

Your discount is included in the prices you see, so it means that, thanks to our discount for Priceless London users, you could enjoy an ultra-relaxing start to your trip to or from London from as little as £13.50.

This exclusive offer is only available to MasterCard cardholders and expires on the 31st of December 2012.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: Please see partner site for terms and conditions.

Offers.OfferTitle: The Egerton House Hotel
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Special package including two nights accommodation and two tickets to the exhibition of your choice
Offers.OfferDetail:
The Egerton House Hotel is a boutique five star London hotel, winner of the award for Most Excellent City Hotel at the 2012 Condé Nast Johansens Awards. On the doorstep of the Egerton is the Victoria and Albert Museum, generally considered to be the world's greatest museum of art and design, with collections unrivalled in their scope and diversity. Visitors can explore 3000 years of amazing artefacts from many of the world's richest cultures.

The Egerton House Hotel has put together a special package which gives you the opportunity to visit this fantastic museum and experience the legendary luxury and service that brings guests back time and again to the hotel.

The package includes two nights accommodation in a beautifully appointed room along with two tickets to the exhibition of your choice, a catalogue detailing everything on show, traditional Afternoon Tea for two on one day and full English breakfast daily.

After the exhibition you are also invited to enjoy a legendary Martini for two with our compliments before returning to your room to watch a movie and enjoy the many amenities at your leisure.
Offers.TermsAndConditions:
Offer valid to 31 December 2012.

Offer is subject to availability. Blackout dates may apply.

See partner site for full terms and conditions.

Offers.OfferTitle: The Rubens Hotel
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Choose two complimentary treats when you stay two nights or more
Offers.OfferDetail:
The Rubens at the Palace Hotel lies at the heart of some of London's biggest tourist attractions, it's an unbeatable location. The Rubens is the closest hotel to Buckingham Palace and near to some of London's best shops, restaurants and theatres, with Knightsbridge just a short bus ride away and Wicked the Musical within walking distance.

With so much to do in London you'll want to relax in style so choose two of the following treats to make your stay even more memorable.

  • Romantic Turndown on one evening complete with chocolate-dipped strawberries, rose petals and floating candles
  • Two-course carvery dinner in the Old Masters Restaurant on one evening for two adults
  • Bottle of Pink Champagne on arrival
Offers.TermsAndConditions:
Offer valid till 31 December 2012.

Offer is subject to availability. Blackout dates may apply.

See partner site for full terms and conditions.

Offers.OfferTitle: Luxury stay including Afternoon Tea
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Complimentary Afternoon Tea with your next weekend stay in London
Offers.OfferDetail:
When you stay during the weekend at The Park Lane Hotel or Le Méridien Piccadilly, take time to enjoy a complimentary Afternoon Tea.

The Park Lane Hotel is an Art Deco landmark located on Piccadilly, close to Green Park and Buckingham Palace. Rates including Afternoon Tea from £169 per night.

Le Méridien Piccadilly is set in the heart of London's West End, at Piccadilly Circus and offers a contemporary atmosphere of understated elegance. Rates including Afternoon Tea from £209 per night.

Valid for stays during the weekend through to end of December 2012.
Offers.TermsAndConditions:
- Offer is subject to availability.

- Valid during weekends only for stays through end of May 2012.

- Offer includes 2 afternoon teas per stay.

- Offer not applicable to groups and cannot be combined with any other promotions.

Offers.OfferTitle: Free Nights with Starwood Hotels & Resorts
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Reward yourself with free nights when you stay in Central London
Offers.OfferDetail:
Book a minimum 2 night stay over a weekend at Starwood Hotels & Resorts' Central London hotels, and the next night is Free.

Choose from these participating hotels:

- The Park Lane Hotel

- W London - Leicester Square

- Le Méridien Piccadilly

- Sheraton Park Tower

- Aloft London Excel

Valid upon availability for stays until December 2012.
Offers.TermsAndConditions: Terms and Conditions apply.

Offers.Offer: Carlson Plaza on the River Upgrade
Offers.OfferTitle: Carlson Plaza on the River Upgrade
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Full dining package included
Offers.OfferDetail:
Perfectly located near to Big Ben and The Houses of Parliament, the 5-star Plaza on The River provides spectacular views across London.

This all-suite hotel is the essence of 5 Star luxury in the heart of the London, providing guests with all the comforts of home and more. With your MasterCard World Elite card, you can upgrade to a 2-Bedroom Suite with a view of the Thames itself. This exclusive package includes breakfast and a chef's taster menu at the award winning Pan-Asian restaurant Chino Latino.
Offers.TermsAndConditions:
Subject to availability.

All prices exclude VAT.

Offers.OfferTitle: Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London
Offers.OfferSubtitle: Full dining package included
Offers.OfferDetail:
The newly opened Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London is situated in London's South Bank, within walking distance of the city's most iconic attractions, including Big Ben and the Houses of Parliament, London Eye and the London Aquarium.

This outstanding hotel features contemporary guest rooms all furnished to an extremely high standard. All rooms feature free wifi, flat screen TVs, work space and tea and coffee making facilities.

As a MasterCard World Elite cardholder, you will benefit from a free upgrade to the Presidential Suite. As well as a full English Breakfast, this exclusive package includes a 3-course dinner at Brasserie Joel and a 50 minute Balinese Massage per person at the Mandara Spa, both of which are located within the hotel itself as well as an indoor swimming pool and Fitness Centre.
Offers.TermsAndConditions:
Subject to availability.

All prices exclude VAT.

Offers.OfferTitle: 10% off hotel bookings with lastminute.com
Offers.OfferSubtitle: An even better deal with your MasterCard
Offers.OfferDetail:
10% off hotel bookings featured on lastminute.com, when you pay with MasterCard.

lastminute.com have done all the homework for you and have secured some of the best deals available on a wide range of hotels. So whether you are after a one night stay or a longer break you can find great deals and then go one step further and get another 10% off.

So whether you're planning a romantic weekend, time alone to unwind or a cultural experience for the kids, lastminute.com is here for you. Their price match promise guarantees that if you find anywhere cheaper, they will equal the difference - add on your 10% discount and you've got a super bargain.

Enter promo code MCARD10 at checkout to apply your MasterCard discount.
